product_name: Overland Equipment Quincy Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Overland Equipment Quincy shoulder bag is a must-have for the woman on the go. Wear it comfortably over your shoulder or extend the strap to wear it across your body. The front flap has a magnetic closure to keep your cell phone, keys and lip balm concealed in the 5-pocket organizer; one pocket is fleece lined for your cell phone. The main zippered compartment is large enough to hold a large wallet, snacks, a small camera or anything else you need as you head out on your adventures. Adjustable 1.5 in.-wide strap. Durable, easy-to-clean ballistic nylon exterior; ripstop nylon lining. Closeout.
short_description: The Overland Equipment Quincy shoulder bag is a must-have for the woman on the go. Wear it comfortably over your shoulder or extend the strap to wear it across your body.
